Cleveland.Fairfax Intergenerational Housing Griot: Fairfax Intergenerational Housing project, also known as Griot Village, located in Cleveland, Ohio, is the first of its kind in Ohio, providing specialized housing for intergenerational households. The project offers an affordable, innovative, sustainable and supportive environment for seniors, ages 55 and older, who have legal custody of children. It is a hybrid development serving both youth and seniors and designed with Enterprise Green Community standards.
